contentrichtext.text: == Summary == {{Non-free use rationale | Description = Photo of Karl Menger, Mathematician - Photographer: unknown | Source = [http://www.math.iit.edu/Menger/menger5.jpg Image] from [http://www.iit.edu/csl/am/about/menger/ Illinois Institute of Technology] | Article = Karl Menger | Portion = | Low_resolution = Yes | Purpose = This image is being used for identification of a deceased historic figure who is the subject of an article written for nonprofit informational purposes. It is believed that the use of the image on Wikipedia will have no impact on the commercial value of the image or any other works it is currently used in. | Replaceability = Biographical image of a deceased individual, provision of a replacement image meeting the stated purpose would thus be impossible. | other_information = }} [http://www.mypoemsaboutlife.com Poems about Life] == Licensing == {{Non-free biog-pic|Karl Menger|image has rationale=yes }} {{Non-free reviewed|date=18:53, 11 May 2011 (UTC)|user=[[User:Moe Epsilon|Moe Epsilon]]|pages=[[Karl Menger]]}}
